resource: 用户申请 接口 相关的API

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
申请使用的时限{one_month: 0,
                                    two_month: 1,
                                    three_month: 3,
                                    six_month: 4,
                                    one_year: 5,
                                    two_year: 6,
                                    three_year: 7
                                    }

requests.curl:
curl "http://smart-life.com//appointments" -d 'appointment[interface_document_ids][]=1&appointment[interface_document_ids][]=2&appointment[interface_document_ids][]=3&appointment[range]=one_month' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "X-User-Token: qwertyuiop" \
	-H "X-User-Phone: 13813813811" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \
	-H "Cookie: "
